snippet: Mitch McConnell wants to debate and vote on whether to give the president authorization to use force against Iran. Harry Reid says that won't happen. John Kerry, meanwhile, attacks Mitt Romney.
abstract: Mitch McConnell wants to debate and vote on whether to give the president authorization to use force against Iran. Harry Reid says that won't happen. John Kerry, meanwhile, attacks Mitt Romney.

headline.main: More Iran War Talk From the Senate
